sentences.en: A cloud is a condensation of water vapour in the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 云是由大气中的水蒸气凝结成的.

sentences.en: A cloud is a mass of vapour in the sky.
sentences.cn: 云是天空中的水汽团块.

sentences.en: A vapour at saturation is in equilibrium with the bulk phase.
sentences.cn: 饱和蒸汽和凝结相处于平衡状态.

sentences.en: Clouds are formations of condensed water vapour.
sentences.cn: 云是由凝聚的水蒸气构成的.

sentences.en: He sniffed the vapour up ( through his nose ).
sentences.cn: 他 ( 用鼻子 ) 吸入蒸气.

sentences.en: Heated, water will change to vapour.
sentences.cn: 水经过加热就会变成蒸气.

sentences.en: However, it does not require an absorbed vapour layer to become effective.
sentences.cn: 然而, 它不需要被吸收的水汽层来发挥效能.

sentences.en: Ice possesses a lower equilibrium vapour pressure than water.
sentences.cn: 冰具有比水低的平衡蒸汽压.

sentences.en: Petrol forms vapour above a certain temperature.
sentences.cn: 高于一定的温度汽油就形成蒸气.

sentences.en: Residue and vapour are withdrawn continuously from the boiler.
sentences.cn: 残液和蒸气不断从再沸器抽出.

sentences.en: The temperature is sensed by a thermocouple located in the vapour space.
sentences.cn: 该温度由位于蒸气空间的热电偶所测出.

sentences.en: Vapour can be changed into liquid by cooling.
sentences.cn: 蒸气可以通过冷却变成液体.

sentences.en: Water vapour condenses to form clouds.
When water changes to water vapour, we say it evaporates.
sentences.cn: 当水变成水蒸气时, 我们把这个过程叫做蒸发.

sentences.en: When water vapour changes to water, we say that it condenses.
sentences.cn: 当水蒸气变成水时, 我们把它叫做冷凝.

words.tran_cn: 似蒸气的；模糊的；忧郁病的
空想的；多蒸气的；雾状的

phrases.tran_cn: 汽压；蒸汽压力；水汽压力

trans.tran_en: a mass of very small drops of a liquid which float in the air, for example because the liquid has been heated
